mapper.select:
SELECT DDDP , DBNA , COUNT(MCT1) AS MCT1 , COUNT(MCT2) AS MCT2 , COUNT(NCNT) AS NCNT , COUNT(G1CN) AS G1CN , COUNT(W1CT) AS W1CT , COUNT(W2CT) AS W2CT , COUNT(W1CT) + COUNT(W2CT) AS WACC , TRUNC(((COUNT(W1CT)+COUNT(W2CT))/MAX(FIX_CHK_WRK_CNT)*100),1) AS WPER , (COUNT(W1CT)*1 + COUNT(W2CT)*2) AS HACC , TRUNC(((COUNT(W1CT)*1 + COUNT(W2CT)*2)/MAX(FIX_CHK_WRK_CNT)*100),1) AS HPER , COUNT(W3CT) AS W3CT , COUNT(W4CT) AS W4CT , COUNT(W5CT) AS W5CT , COUNT(G1CN) + COUNT(W1CT) + COUNT(W2CT) + COUNT(W3CT) + COUNT(W4CT) + COUNT(W5CT) WCNT , COUNT(ECNT) AS ECNT , COUNT(GCNT) AS GCNT , MAX(FIX_CHK_WRK_CNT) AS WRK_CNT FROM ( SELECT LCDE -- 관리파트너번호 , DDDP -- 지역단 , DDPT -- 지점 , DBNA , DDDP_OG_ID -- 지점ID , PRTNR_KNM -- 파트너한글명 , OG_ID -- 조직ID , PSTN_DV_CD -- 직급구분코드 , MCT1 -- 고정파트너여부 , MCT2 -- 고정파트너여부 , NCNT -- 매니저급지구분코드..'1' , G1CN -- 매니저급지구분코드..'2' , W1CT -- 매니저급지구분코드..'3' , W2CT -- 매니저급지구분코드..'4' , W3CT -- 매니저급지구분코드..'5' , W4CT -- 매니저급지구분코드..'6' , W5CT -- 매니저급지구분코드..'7' , ECNT -- 매니저급지구분코드..'' , GCNT -- 매니저급지구분코드 , KGUB , FIX_CHK_WRK_CNT , HELDT -- 계약년월일 , BYEDT -- 해약년월일 FROM ( SELECT AC202.MNGT_PRTNR_NO AS LCDE , T3.DGR1_LEVL_OG_CD AS CDPT , T3.DGR1_LEVL_OG_ID AS DGR1_LEVL_OG_ID , T3.DGR2_LEVL_OG_CD AS DDDP , T3.BLD_NM AS DBNA , T3.DGR2_LEVL_OG_ID AS DDDP_OG_ID , T3.DGR3_LEVL_OG_CD AS DDPT , T3.DGR3_LEVL_OG_ID AS DGR3_LEVL_OG_ID , T2.PRTNR_KNM , T2.OG_ID , PRT_DTL.PSTN_DV_CD , DECODE(AC202.FXN_PRTNR_YN,'9','','1') MCT1 , DECODE(AC202.FXN_PRTNR_YN,'9','1','') MCT2 , DECODE(AC202.MNGER_RGLVL_DV_CD,'1','1','') NCNT , DECODE(AC202.MNGER_RGLVL_DV_CD,'2','1','') G1CN , DECODE(AC202.MNGER_RGLVL_DV_CD,'3','1','') W1CT , DECODE(AC202.MNGER_RGLVL_DV_CD,'4','1','') W2CT , DECODE(AC202.MNGER_RGLVL_DV_CD,'5','1','') W3CT , DECODE(AC202.MNGER_RGLVL_DV_CD,'6','1','') W4CT , DECODE(AC202.MNGER_RGLVL_DV_CD,'7','1','') W5CT , DECODE(AC202.MNGER_RGLVL_DV_CD,'' ,'1','') ECNT , AC202.MNGER_RGLVL_DV_CD GCNT , CASE WHEN AC202.FXN_PRTNR_YN = '9' THEN '1' ELSE ( SELECT SUB7.MNGR_DV_CD FROM TB_SVPD_LOCARA_BFSVC_OGMGR_IZ SUB7 WHERE SUB7.NEW_ADR_ZIP = G_ADR.NEW_ADR_ZIP ) END AS MGT_GB , CASE WHEN ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_SVPD_CST_SV_BFSVC_ASN_IZ SUB1 WHERE SUB1.ASN_OJ_YM = AC202.MNGT_YM AND SUB1.CNTR_NO = AC202.CNTR_NO AND SUB1.CNTR_SN = AC202.CNTR_SN AND WK_EXCN_DT IS NULL ) > 0 THEN '3' WHEN ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_SVPD_CST_SV_BFSVC_ASN_IZ SUB2 WHERE SUB2.ASN_OJ_YM = AC202.MNGT_YM AND SUB2.CNTR_NO = AC202.CNTR_NO AND SUB2.CNTR_SN = AC202.CNTR_SN AND WK_EXCN_DT IS NOT NULL ) > 0 THEN '4' WHEN AC202.CAN_DT IS NOT NULL THEN '5' WHEN PECOM.PD_PRP_VAL20 = '1' AND AC202.VST_NMN_N <= 3 THEN '1' WHEN PECOM.PD_PRP_VAL20 != '1' AND AC202.VST_NMN_N <= 2 THEN '1' ELSE '2' END AS KGUB , FIX_CHK_WRK_CNT , CNTR_DT AS HELDT /* 계약년월일 */ , NVL(FNL_CLTN_DT, CLTN_DT) AS BYEDT /* 해약년월일 */ FROM TB_SVPD_MCBY_CST_SV_OJ_IZ AC202 INNER JOIN TB_SVPD_CST_SV_EXCN_IZ AC201 ON AC201.CNTR_NO = AC202.CNTR_NO AND AC201.CNTR_SN = AC202.CNTR_SN INNER JOIN TB_SVPD_CST_SV_BFSVC_ASN_IZ AC261 ON AC202.CNTR_NO = AC261.CNTR_NO AND AC202.CNTR_SN = AC261.CNTR_SN AND AC261.ASN_OJ_YM = AC202.MNGT_YM AND AC261.VST_PRGS_STAT_CD NOT IN ('73') AND AC261.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD NOT IN ('2140') INNER JOIN TB_OGBS_PRTNR_BAS T2 /*파트너기본*/ ON AC261.CNFM_PSIC_PRTNR_NO = T2.PRTNR_NO AND AC261.CNFM_PSIC_PRTNR_OG_TP_CD = T2.OG_TP_CD INNER JOIN TB_OGBS_PRTNR_DTL PRT_DTL ON PRT_DTL.OG_TP_CD = AC261.CNFM_PSIC_PRTNR_OG_TP_CD AND PRT_DTL.PRTNR_NO = AC261.CNFM_PSIC_PRTNR_NO INNER JOIN TB_OGBS_MM_OG_IZ T3 /*월조직내역*/ ON T3.BASE_YM = #{vstYm} AND T3.OG_ID = T2.OG_ID AND T3.OG_TP_CD IN ('W02') /*조직유형코드 W01 P추진, W02 M추진, W03 홈마스터, W04 B2B, W05 온라인총판, W06 엔지니어, ALC 제휴채널, HR1 임직원, BND 채권, L01 라이프, X01 KLC, X02 L C전문강사*/ AND T3.CLO_DT IS NULL AND T3.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' INNER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_BAS PBAS ON PBAS.PD_CD = AC202.PDCT_PD_CD INNER JOIN WSMDBS.TB_PDBS_PD_ECOM_PRP_DTL PECOM /*상품각사속성상세*/ ON PBAS.PD_CD = PECOM.PD_CD AND PECOM.PD_EXTS_PRP_GRP_CD = 'PART' INNER JOIN WSMDBS.TB_SSCT_CNTR_ADR_REL ADR_REL /*계약주소관계*/ ON AC261.CNTR_NO = ADR_REL.DTL_CNTR_NO AND AC261.CNTR_SN = ADR_REL.DTL_CNTR_SN AND ADR_REL.ADRPC_TP_CD IN ('2','3') /*1 계약주소, 2 배달주소,3 설치주소*/ AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') BETWEEN ADR_REL.VL_STRT_DTM AND ADR_REL.VL_END_DTM INNER JOIN WSMDBS.TB_SSCT_CNTR_ADRPC_BAS ADR_BAS /*계약주소지기본*/ ON ADR_REL.CNTR_ADRPC_ID = ADR_BAS.CNTR_ADRPC_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN GBSDBS.TB_GBCO_ADR_BAS G_ADR ON ADR_BAS.ADR_ID = G_ADR.ADR_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OGBS_PRTNR_BAS SUB3 /*파트너기본*/ ON AC202.MNGT_PRTNR_NO = SUB3.PRTNR_NO AND AC202.MNGT_PRTNR_OG_TP_CD = SUB3.OG_TP_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OGBS_MM_OG_IZ SUB4 /*월조직내역*/ ON SUB4.BASE_YM = #{vstYm} AND SUB4.OG_ID = T2.OG_ID AND SUB4.OG_TP_CD IN ('W02') /*조직유형코드 W01 P추진, W02 M추진, W03 홈마스터, W04 B2B, W05 온라인총판, W06 엔지니어, ALC 제휴채널, HR1 임직원, BND 채권, L01 라이프, X01 KLC, X02 L C전문강사*/ AND SUB4.CLO_DT IS NULL AND SUB4.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT BIZ_CD , COUNT(1) AS FIX_CHK_WRK_CNT FROM ( SELECT T3.DGR2_LEVL_OG_CD AS BIZ_CD , AC261.CNTR_NO , AC261.CST_SV_ASN_NO , CASE WHEN ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_SVPD_CST_SV_BFSVC_ASN_IZ SUB1 WHERE SUB1.ASN_OJ_YM = AC202.MNGT_YM AND SUB1.CNTR_NO = AC202.CNTR_NO AND SUB1.CNTR_SN = AC202.CNTR_SN AND WK_EXCN_DT IS NULL ) > 0 THEN '3' WHEN ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_SVPD_CST_SV_BFSVC_ASN_IZ SUB2 WHERE SUB2.ASN_OJ_YM = AC202.MNGT_YM AND SUB2.CNTR_NO = AC202.CNTR_NO AND SUB2.CNTR_SN = AC202.CNTR_SN AND WK_EXCN_DT IS NOT NULL ) > 0 THEN '4' WHEN AC202.CAN_DT IS NOT NULL THEN '5' WHEN PECOM.PD_PRP_VAL20 = '1' AND AC202.VST_NMN_N <= 3 THEN '1' WHEN PECOM.PD_PRP_VAL20 != '1' AND AC202.VST_NMN_N <= 2 THEN '1' ELSE '2' END AS KGUB FROM TB_SVPD_CST_SV_BFSVC_ASN_IZ AC261 INNER JOIN TB_SVPD_MCBY_CST_SV_OJ_IZ AC202 ON AC202.CNTR_NO = AC261.CNTR_NO AND AC202.CNTR_SN = AC261.CNTR_SN AND AC202.MNGT_YM = #{vstYm} INNER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_BAS PBAS ON PBAS.PD_CD = AC202.PDCT_PD_CD INNER JOIN WSMDBS.TB_PDBS_PD_ECOM_PRP_DTL PECOM /*상품각사속성상세*/ ON PBAS.PD_CD = PECOM.PD_CD AND PECOM.PD_EXTS_PRP_GRP_CD = 'PART' INNER JOIN TB_OGBS_PRTNR_BAS T2 /*파트너기본*/ ON AC261.CNFM_PSIC_PRTNR_NO = T2.PRTNR_NO AND AC261.CNFM_PSIC_PRTNR_OG_TP_CD = T2.OG_TP_CD INNER JOIN TB_OGBS_MM_OG_IZ T3 /*월조직내역*/ ON T3.BASE_YM = #{vstYm} AND T3.OG_ID = T2.OG_ID AND T3.OG_TP_CD IN ('W02') /*조직유형코드 W01 P추진, W02 M추진, W03 홈마스터, W04 B2B, W05 온라인총판, W06 엔지니어, ALC 제휴채널, HR1 임직원, BND 채권, L01 라이프, X01 KLC, X02 L C전문강사*/ AND T3.CLO_DT IS NULL AND T3.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_DTL CNTR_DTL ON CNTR_DTL.CNTR_NO = AC261.CNTR_NO AND CNTR_DTL.CNTR_SN = AC261.CNTR_SN AND CNTR_DTL.CNTR_PD_ENDDT = AC261.ASN_OJ_YM WHERE 1=1 AND AC261.ASN_OJ_YM = #{vstYm} AND DECODE(AC261.CNFM_PSIC_DV_CD,'','1', AC261.CNFM_PSIC_DV_CD) = '1' /* 1 매니져, 2 엔지니어 */ AND SUBSTR(CST_SV_ASN_NO,1,1) = '2' AND (AC261.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD = '2110' OR AC261.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD NOT IN ('2110','2140') )/* 정기점검만 */ /*취소가 아닌 대기 건수 + 완료건수 (중지건은 제외)*/ AND (AC261.VST_PRGS_STAT_CD = '20' OR (AC261.VST_PRGS_STAT_CD NOT IN ('20','73') AND REQD_DT IS NULL AND CAN_DT IS NULL AND CPS_DT IS NULL AND AC261.CNTR_NO IS NULL)) )
WHERE KGUB = #{rcgvpDiv} -- 고객구분
GROUP BY BIZ_CD ) MEM_T ON BIZ_CD = T3.DGR2_LEVL_OG_CD WHERE AC202.MNGT_YM = #{vstYm} AND (AC202.MNGR_DV_CD IS NULL OR AC202.MNGR_DV_CD = '1') ) WHERE 1=1
AND KGUB = #{rcgvpDiv} -- 고객구분
AND DGR1_LEVL_OG_ID = #{dgr1LevlOgId} -- 총괄단
AND DDDP_OG_ID = #{dgr2LevlOgId} -- 지역단
) GROUP BY DDDP, DBNA, DDDP_OG_ID ORDER BY DDDP

SELECT LPAD(LCDE,7,'0') AS LCDE , MAX(DDDP) AS DDDP , MAX(DDPT) AS DDPT , PRTNR_KNM AS LNAM , DBNA , MAX(PSTN_DV_CD) AS LDEG , HELDT , BYEDT , ROUND(months_between(DECODE(BYEDT, NULL, SYSDATE, BYEDT), HELDT)) AS DULDT , COUNT(MCT1) AS MCT1 , COUNT(MCT2) AS MCT2 , COUNT(NCNT) AS NCNT , COUNT(G1CN) AS G1CN , COUNT(W1CT) AS W1CT , COUNT(W2CT) AS W2CT , COUNT(W1CT) + COUNT(W2CT) AS WACC , TRUNC(((COUNT(W1CT)+COUNT(W2CT))/MAX(FIX_CHK_WRK_CNT)*100),1) AS WPER , (COUNT(W1CT)*1 + COUNT(W2CT)*2) AS HACC , TRUNC(((COUNT(W1CT)*1 + COUNT(W2CT)*2)/MAX(FIX_CHK_WRK_CNT)*100),1) AS HPER , COUNT(W3CT) AS W3CT , COUNT(W4CT) AS W4CT , COUNT(W5CT) AS W5CT , COUNT(G1CN) + COUNT(W1CT) + COUNT(W2CT) + COUNT(W3CT) + COUNT(W4CT) + COUNT(W5CT) WCNT , COUNT(ECNT) AS ECNT , COUNT(GCNT) AS GCNT , MAX(FIX_CHK_WRK_CNT) AS WRK_CNT FROM ( SELECT LCDE -- 관리파트너번호 , DDDP -- 지역단 , DDPT -- 지점 , DBNA -- 빌딩명 , DDDP_OG_ID -- 지점ID , PRTNR_KNM -- 파트너한글명 , OG_ID -- 조직ID , PSTN_DV_CD -- 직급구분코드 , MCT1 -- 고정파트너여부 , MCT2 -- 고정파트너여부 , NCNT -- 매니저급지구분코드..'1' , G1CN -- 매니저급지구분코드..'2' , W1CT -- 매니저급지구분코드..'3' , W2CT -- 매니저급지구분코드..'4' , W3CT -- 매니저급지구분코드..'5' , W4CT -- 매니저급지구분코드..'6' , W5CT -- 매니저급지구분코드..'7' , ECNT -- 매니저급지구분코드..'' , GCNT -- 매니저급지구분코드 , KGUB , FIX_CHK_WRK_CNT , HELDT -- 계약년월일 , BYEDT -- 해약년월일 FROM ( SELECT AC202.MNGT_PRTNR_NO AS LCDE , T3.DGR1_LEVL_OG_CD AS CDPT , T3.DGR1_LEVL_OG_ID AS DGR1_LEVL_OG_ID , T3.DGR2_LEVL_OG_CD AS DDDP , T3.BLD_NM AS DBNA , T3.DGR2_LEVL_OG_ID AS DDDP_OG_ID , T3.DGR3_LEVL_OG_CD DDPT , T2.PRTNR_KNM , T2.OG_ID , PRT_DTL.PSTN_DV_CD , DECODE(AC202.FXN_PRTNR_YN,'9','','1') MCT1 , DECODE(AC202.FXN_PRTNR_YN,'9','1','') MCT2 , DECODE(AC202.MNGER_RGLVL_DV_CD,'1','1','') NCNT , DECODE(AC202.MNGER_RGLVL_DV_CD,'2','1','') G1CN , DECODE(AC202.MNGER_RGLVL_DV_CD,'3','1','') W1CT , DECODE(AC202.MNGER_RGLVL_DV_CD,'4','1','') W2CT , DECODE(AC202.MNGER_RGLVL_DV_CD,'5','1','') W3CT , DECODE(AC202.MNGER_RGLVL_DV_CD,'6','1','') W4CT , DECODE(AC202.MNGER_RGLVL_DV_CD,'7','1','') W5CT , DECODE(AC202.MNGER_RGLVL_DV_CD,'' ,'1','') ECNT , AC202.MNGER_RGLVL_DV_CD GCNT , CASE WHEN AC202.FXN_PRTNR_YN = '9' THEN '1' ELSE ( SELECT SUB7.MNGR_DV_CD FROM TB_SVPD_LOCARA_BFSVC_OGMGR_IZ SUB7 WHERE SUB7.NEW_ADR_ZIP = G_ADR.NEW_ADR_ZIP ) END AS MGT_GB , CASE WHEN ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_SVPD_CST_SV_BFSVC_ASN_IZ SUB1 WHERE SUB1.ASN_OJ_YM = AC202.MNGT_YM AND SUB1.CNTR_NO = AC202.CNTR_NO AND SUB1.CNTR_SN = AC202.CNTR_SN AND WK_EXCN_DT IS NULL ) > 0 THEN '3' WHEN ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_SVPD_CST_SV_BFSVC_ASN_IZ SUB2 WHERE SUB2.ASN_OJ_YM = AC202.MNGT_YM AND SUB2.CNTR_NO = AC202.CNTR_NO AND SUB2.CNTR_SN = AC202.CNTR_SN AND WK_EXCN_DT IS NOT NULL ) > 0 THEN '4' WHEN AC202.CAN_DT IS NOT NULL THEN '5' WHEN PECOM.PD_PRP_VAL20 = '1' AND AC202.VST_NMN_N <= 3 THEN '1' WHEN PECOM.PD_PRP_VAL20 != '1' AND AC202.VST_NMN_N <= 2 THEN '1' ELSE '2' END AS KGUB , FIX_CHK_WRK_CNT , CNTR_DT AS HELDT /* 계약년월일 */ , NVL(FNL_CLTN_DT, CLTN_DT) AS BYEDT /* 해약년월일 */ FROM TB_SVPD_MCBY_CST_SV_OJ_IZ AC202 INNER JOIN TB_SVPD_CST_SV_EXCN_IZ AC201 ON AC201.CNTR_NO = AC202.CNTR_NO AND AC201.CNTR_SN = AC202.CNTR_SN INNER JOIN TB_SVPD_CST_SV_BFSVC_ASN_IZ AC261 ON AC202.CNTR_NO = AC261.CNTR_NO AND AC202.CNTR_SN = AC261.CNTR_SN AND AC261.ASN_OJ_YM = AC202.MNGT_YM AND AC261.VST_PRGS_STAT_CD NOT IN ('73') AND AC261.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD NOT IN ('2140') INNER JOIN TB_OGBS_PRTNR_BAS T2 /*파트너기본*/ ON AC261.CNFM_PSIC_PRTNR_NO = T2.PRTNR_NO AND AC261.CNFM_PSIC_PRTNR_OG_TP_CD = T2.OG_TP_CD INNER JOIN TB_OGBS_PRTNR_DTL PRT_DTL ON PRT_DTL.OG_TP_CD = AC261.CNFM_PSIC_PRTNR_OG_TP_CD AND PRT_DTL.PRTNR_NO = AC261.CNFM_PSIC_PRTNR_NO INNER JOIN TB_OGBS_MM_OG_IZ T3 /*월조직내역*/ ON T3.BASE_YM = #{vstYm} AND T3.OG_ID = T2.OG_ID AND T3.OG_TP_CD IN ('W02') /*조직유형코드 W01 P추진, W02 M추진, W03 홈마스터, W04 B2B, W05 온라인총판, W06 엔지니어, ALC 제휴채널, HR1 임직원, BND 채권, L01 라이프, X01 KLC, X02 L C전문강사*/ AND T3.CLO_DT IS NULL AND T3.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' INNER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_BAS PBAS ON PBAS.PD_CD = AC202.PDCT_PD_CD INNER JOIN WSMDBS.TB_PDBS_PD_ECOM_PRP_DTL PECOM /*상품각사속성상세*/ ON PBAS.PD_CD = PECOM.PD_CD AND PECOM.PD_EXTS_PRP_GRP_CD = 'PART' INNER JOIN WSMDBS.TB_SSCT_CNTR_ADR_REL ADR_REL /*계약주소관계*/ ON AC261.CNTR_NO = ADR_REL.DTL_CNTR_NO AND AC261.CNTR_SN = ADR_REL.DTL_CNTR_SN AND ADR_REL.ADRPC_TP_CD IN ('2','3') /*1 계약주소, 2 배달주소,3 설치주소*/ AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') BETWEEN ADR_REL.VL_STRT_DTM AND ADR_REL.VL_END_DTM INNER JOIN WSMDBS.TB_SSCT_CNTR_ADRPC_BAS ADR_BAS /*계약주소지기본*/ ON ADR_REL.CNTR_ADRPC_ID = ADR_BAS.CNTR_ADRPC_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN GBSDBS.TB_GBCO_ADR_BAS G_ADR ON ADR_BAS.ADR_ID = G_ADR.ADR_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OGBS_PRTNR_BAS SUB3 /*파트너기본*/ ON AC202.MNGT_PRTNR_NO = SUB3.PRTNR_NO AND AC202.MNGT_PRTNR_OG_TP_CD = SUB3.OG_TP_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OGBS_MM_OG_IZ SUB4 /*월조직내역*/ ON SUB4.BASE_YM = #{vstYm} AND SUB4.OG_ID = T2.OG_ID AND SUB4.OG_TP_CD IN ('W02') /*조직유형코드 W01 P추진, W02 M추진, W03 홈마스터, W04 B2B, W05 온라인총판, W06 엔지니어, ALC 제휴채널, HR1 임직원, BND 채권, L01 라이프, X01 KLC, X02 L C전문강사*/ AND SUB4.CLO_DT IS NULL AND SUB4.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT BIZ_CD , COUNT(1) AS FIX_CHK_WRK_CNT FROM ( SELECT T3.DGR2_LEVL_OG_CD AS BIZ_CD , AC261.CNTR_NO , AC261.CST_SV_ASN_NO , CASE WHEN ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_SVPD_CST_SV_BFSVC_ASN_IZ SUB1 WHERE SUB1.ASN_OJ_YM = AC202.MNGT_YM AND SUB1.CNTR_NO = AC202.CNTR_NO AND SUB1.CNTR_SN = AC202.CNTR_SN AND WK_EXCN_DT IS NULL ) > 0 THEN '3' WHEN ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_SVPD_CST_SV_BFSVC_ASN_IZ SUB2 WHERE SUB2.ASN_OJ_YM = AC202.MNGT_YM AND SUB2.CNTR_NO = AC202.CNTR_NO AND SUB2.CNTR_SN = AC202.CNTR_SN AND WK_EXCN_DT IS NOT NULL ) > 0 THEN '4' WHEN AC202.CAN_DT IS NOT NULL THEN '5' WHEN PECOM.PD_PRP_VAL20 = '1' AND AC202.VST_NMN_N <= 3 THEN '1' WHEN PECOM.PD_PRP_VAL20 != '1' AND AC202.VST_NMN_N <= 2 THEN '1' ELSE '2' END AS KGUB FROM TB_SVPD_CST_SV_BFSVC_ASN_IZ AC261 INNER JOIN TB_SVPD_MCBY_CST_SV_OJ_IZ AC202 ON AC202.CNTR_NO = AC261.CNTR_NO AND AC202.CNTR_SN = AC261.CNTR_SN AND AC202.MNGT_YM = #{vstYm} INNER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_BAS PBAS ON PBAS.PD_CD = AC202.PDCT_PD_CD INNER JOIN WSMDBS.TB_PDBS_PD_ECOM_PRP_DTL PECOM /*상품각사속성상세*/ ON PBAS.PD_CD = PECOM.PD_CD AND PECOM.PD_EXTS_PRP_GRP_CD = 'PART' INNER JOIN TB_OGBS_PRTNR_BAS T2 /*파트너기본*/ ON AC261.CNFM_PSIC_PRTNR_NO = T2.PRTNR_NO AND AC261.CNFM_PSIC_PRTNR_OG_TP_CD = T2.OG_TP_CD INNER JOIN TB_OGBS_MM_OG_IZ T3 /*월조직내역*/ ON T3.BASE_YM = #{vstYm} AND T3.OG_ID = T2.OG_ID AND T3.OG_TP_CD IN ('W02') /*조직유형코드 W01 P추진, W02 M추진, W03 홈마스터, W04 B2B, W05 온라인총판, W06 엔지니어, ALC 제휴채널, HR1 임직원, BND 채권, L01 라이프, X01 KLC, X02 L C전문강사*/ AND T3.CLO_DT IS NULL AND T3.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_DTL CNTR_DTL ON CNTR_DTL.CNTR_NO = AC261.CNTR_NO AND CNTR_DTL.CNTR_SN = AC261.CNTR_SN AND CNTR_DTL.CNTR_PD_ENDDT = AC261.ASN_OJ_YM WHERE 1=1 AND AC261.ASN_OJ_YM = #{vstYm} AND DECODE(AC261.CNFM_PSIC_DV_CD,'','1', AC261.CNFM_PSIC_DV_CD) = '1' /* 1 매니져, 2 엔지니어 */ AND SUBSTR(CST_SV_ASN_NO,1,1) = '2' AND (AC261.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD = '2110' OR AC261.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD NOT IN ('2110','2140') )/* 정기점검만 */ /*취소가 아닌 대기 건수 + 완료건수 (중지건은 제외)*/ AND (AC261.VST_PRGS_STAT_CD = '20' OR (AC261.VST_PRGS_STAT_CD NOT IN ('20','73') AND REQD_DT IS NULL AND CAN_DT IS NULL AND CPS_DT IS NULL AND AC261.CNTR_NO IS NULL)) )
WHERE KGUB = #{rcgvpDiv} -- 고객구분
GROUP BY BIZ_CD ) MEM_T ON BIZ_CD = T3.DGR2_LEVL_OG_CD WHERE AC202.MNGT_YM = #{vstYm} AND (AC202.MNGR_DV_CD IS NULL OR AC202.MNGR_DV_CD = '1') ) WHERE 1=1
AND KGUB = #{rcgvpDiv} -- 고객구분
AND DGR1_LEVL_OG_ID = #{dgr1LevlOgId} -- 총괄단
AND DDDP_OG_ID = #{dgr2LevlOgId} -- 지역단
AND LCDE = #{partnerNo} -- 매니저
) GROUP BY LCDE, PRTNR_KNM, OG_ID, DBNA, HELDT, BYEDT ORDER BY LCDE
